name: Spittaz
description:
Spittaz is a 2D puzzle/action game in the spirit of MegaMan Battle Network. You play as Isaiah, a young rapper on a path to be signed to a label. Although, Isaiah isn't the only one on the come up.

You will move and rhyme words to defeat your opponents in thrilling boss battles. 

Made Using
  • Godot 3.1
  • LMMS (Music)
  • Audacity (Sound Editing)
  • Inkscape (Art)
  • Paint.net  (Art)

Music and art created by myself.
